title: Fun Little "Nostalgic" Thing I Found
body:
While in spectator mode, if you open a champions statistics, with the 'C' key I think, it still displays said champions dodge percentage chance. I found this pretty cool, and I wonder how it is still there seeing its removal in game such a long time ago. Obviously all champions dodge percent will read as 0%. Thought I might just tell you all :P

Edit: I tried to insert a picture of it but it didn't work.

replies.body: :P, I'm certain many have found this before me hahaha.
not to be rude but OOOLLLLDDDD
